name: XA Wild GTX Trail Running Shoes - Men's

features: 3D Advanced Chassis™: Placed between the outsole and midsole, this low-profile chassis helps optimize motion control and energy management. It also provides extra protection for a precise, stable and responsive ride.

Contagrip® MA: Contagrip® MA is built for the widest variety of surfaces. It balances both the geometry and the rubber compound to deliver confidence on wet, dry, hard or loose surfaces, and offer long-term durability.
GORE-TEX: GORE-TEX  keeps your feet dry -from the outside as well as from the inside.
